title: Mufasa: The Lion King
tagline: The story of an orphan who would be king.
overview: Told in flashbacks, Mufasa is an orphaned cub, lost and alone until he meets a sympathetic lion named Takaâ€”the heir to a royal bloodline. The chance meeting sets in motion a journey of misfits searching for their destiny and working together to evade a threatening and deadly foe.
